_aChangeLog.text: ladder in m4 secret is back, sorry about that
Fixed some CTs dying at spawn
Changed secret AWPs to Scouts, gave them no extra ammo
Fixed secret round not working every time
Moved more outside CT spawns to the pool
Added ladders to the pool, easier to get out

_sText:
It's mg_smee_tower_fix2 by Mathijs. But better. At first I wanted to fix the elevator, but eventually I worked on revamping most of the map.

Changes

  • Two secret AWPs with trails, and one MP5.
  • Brushwork cleaned up a bit with some optimizations that may make the map run a bit better for some people.
  • Lots of texture changes. Now uses militia skybox.
  • Lighting, shadows...
  • Each team now has 32 spawnpoints (previously 25). 7 CT spawns were moved to the pool.
  • Small ladder added behind the base of the tower.
  • Some boxes added to the roof, and a vending machine added to the lounge room (under vent).
  • Alignment of the ladder from T spawn to roof was fixed.
  • (hopefully) blocked some surf spots.
  • Elevator cleaned up and correctly aligned with the floors. There's also some elevator music and a vent on the ceiling. Elevator buttons now glow, too.
  • Weapon trails look smoother.
  • Pool stairs changed.
  • Cubemaps.
  • Vent cover is now transparent.
  • Replaced bottom floor beneath elevator to a player clip, so everything except players will fall through. This means that smoke grenades can't (well, shouldn't be able to) stop the elevator
  • secret game mode :)
  • ...maybe too secret?
